item.name: General Info
item.content: I have started my career as a web-project manager and now I'm a Web Developer with more than 8 years of well-rounded experience. My skills include HTML, CSS, LAMP administrating and Graphic Design. I also have experience with SEO and Internet Advertising.

content.p: I want to achieve high quality development of web applications and services, to be a reliable partner and worker. At the beginning of career I have tried myself in different areas of IT industry - from manager to backend developer.
For long time I have been preferred freelance work, but now I see more opportunities to cultivate my knowledge and experience working as an employee in IT company. Free time I spend with my family.

Last 3 years I was working in ArtDepo studio as web-developer on 1C-Bitrix CMS, on EcomDev company developing templates for Magento CMS and developing heavy load project PeopleSmart.com on Svitla Systems and Inflection companies using .NET technologies.

rate.item: Ranking above is my own evaluation of my skills in reference to each other. So, the highest score has HTML/CSS because in my opinion developing layout is the best I do, and with the knowledge of JavaScript I'm pretty good front end developer.

Ranking above is my own evaluation of my skills in reference to each other. So, the highest score has HTML/CSS because in my opinion developing layout is the best I do, and with the knowledge of JavaScript I'm pretty good front end developer.
For optimize development process use preprocessors JS (CoffeeScript, TypeScript), html (haml, jade), styles (less, scss).

I have experience of PHP-programing above 5 years. In this time I have written a lot of scripts for CMS's, have developed my own CMS named DEngine which is very successful and useful for me and supports on more then 10 sites. Last time I concentrate on developing own templates for CMSs like Wordpress, Magento and adjusting modules.
Knowledge and experience in pure JS, nodejs, mobile applications. Crossbrowser development. Unit tesing code. Working with different frameworks.

.NET project development and support. Adjustment web-sites on IIS. Internet Explorer 6 html/css markup. Have experience in development product based on Microsoft since working in Svitla Systems (2012).

I prefer work in Linux environmental as server and desktop. Since I have been a student I support Linux servers, later support hostings of Internet Shops and install one server at parents home. As for me - monitoring Linux servers is more easily then Windows.
All my pet projects (including this CV web-site) is designed by my own. Also have experience as a desiginer in companies - has developed corporate style for main products.
Develop complex applications. Architecture and generic solutions for bunch of projects.
Develop complex applications. Architecture and generic solutions for bunch of projects.

content.p:
I have been working in web development for 7 years. Have experience in project management, web-design and OOP programming.
For last 3 years I have concentrated all my forces and skill in front-end development.

description.p: Architecturing web-applications for company's main products.
Developing web application base on AngularJS for different browsers and devices.
Responsible for creating a design for web application in Google Material Design, preparation products for the demo.
I was invited to the command of developers online stores on Magento as front-end developer.
I had the first experience of working in highly qualified programmers team.
Ecomdev is working on Europe and USA and main language within company is english - it's a good practice in speaking and writing documentation
After graduation I wished to try myself in company and was interested in stable income. So I choose for work one of the best web-studios in Ukraine.
My main task was to programming web-sites based on 1C-Bitrix. Supporting big projects with heavy load on the server.
I make my markup HTML pages in a very high level due to very extraordinary designes and scrupulous quality control.
Some big projects give me a opportunity to try myself in my own business.

Company provided the following services: Developing web-sited based on own CMS DEngine; Administrating Linux, FreeBSD and Windows servers. Supporting web-servers and optimization them; System administrating in offices; Tutoring, private lessons in computer science at home, in companies, in institutes;

In the externship of bachelor I was working in Infotec company. It was something like agency of General Electrics in Ukraine. Main objective - to write software simulator for electrical power stations.
My practice got on the period when company was porting programs from Delphi to Java + Oracle and I was responsible for installing and supporting Linux Suse Enterprise and Oracle DB on it.

item.company: DjOne - internet market of music equipment

description.p: I has joined the project at the beginning of it development as main programmer. My task was to write a PHP-system for the chain stores musical equipment.

In one year was developed DEngine System. And for a three years under my direction project has been in progress. More than 30 plugins was been created. At the second year of life the project should migrate from the hosting to the powerful server. System was adjusted and optimized for MySQL, Apache/nginx servers.
Mucos Pharma Become my first official work with employment records as Software Engineer. I am responsible for development online services. Order huge amount of information in DB MySQL.
Responsible for the promotion the production in Internet.
After one year of education I have been joined to Student Science Association of NTUU KPI. Since that time I was involved in many projects like organization of conferences, summer schools.
Then I was concentrated on the web-development and designed cafedral web-site, later site of faculty. Take park in supporting internet resources for conferences.
Has developed internet journal of students progress in points with private access but project stops in bureaucratic reason.

In childhood I was very like books Harry Potter, so, when it was really popular in 2005 I decided to organize fan-club. It was my first experience of web-site creation and managing, meeting with sponsors, speaking with press.
I have created HTML web-site with over then 100 pages, installed forum on IPB CMS. In 2007 year it was more then 2000 members. I was organizator of premiers and books presentation in Ukraine.

content.p: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Cum, animi, consectetur aliquid earum perferendis laborum temporibus tempora explicabo sint mollitia error odio dolorum quas dolore vel incidunt excepturi aspernatur quia.

item.title: PeopleSmart - People Search
item.info: Took park in developing front-end architecture. Developing One Page Applications - in Backbone, AngularJS. Developing heavy load project on ASP.NET MVC (templates on Razor). Creating mixins, architecture for SCSS styles for consolidation member area web-sites.

item.title: PeopleSmart - People Search
item.info: Supporting big web-project on XSLT on pretty outdated technologies. Fixing bugs, implement improvements. Split testing developing.

item.title: Free Phone Tracer - Reverse Phone Lookup
item.info: One of the satelite on PeopleSmart. Supporting this project on XSLT/CSS2/HTML4 on pretty outdated technologies. Fixing bugs, implement improvements. Split testing developing.

item.title: Emailfinder - Email Search
item.info: One of the satelite on PeopleSmart. Supporting this project on XSLT/CSS2/HTML4 on pretty outdated technologies. Fixing bugs, implement improvements. Split testing developing.

item.title: Online Shop "Spytronic"
item.info: Full refactor existing design and markup to Magento templates. Store in 2 localization - french and english.

item.title: Online Shop "Montelle"
item.info: Took park in development. Developed custom sliders slider, extention for spots on picture, CMS pages styling

item.title: Online Shop "BabyPark"
item.info: Project was developed for desktop and mobile devices. A lot of custom elements in forms and popups. Lazy load, quick view in product list. Checkout structure was refactored.

item.title: Company "EcomDev"
item.info: Took part in design and developing template. Been main front-end developer for the project.

item.title: Online Shop "Prima Ouders"
item.info: My first project in which I fully developed front-end part by myself. Now, it's some modificated with another company developers, but main scripts and layout stay.

item.title: TV company "VIASAT Ukraine"
item.info: Has developed approvements. Was resposible for stable work administrating server based on Linux. Took part in redesign.

item.title: Restaurant "Colonnada"
item.info: XMTML Markup and programming. Support project.

item.title: Medication "Wobenzym"
item.info: My idea to create separate web-site for promo Mucos Pharma product. SEO optimization

item.title: Company "Ecobond"
item.info: My task was to installing and adjusting component of quiz developed in Art Depo.

item.title: Design Studio "Art Depo"
item.info: Remotely installing and adjusting server based on Linux Debian. Optimization for stable and efficient work of web-server.

item.title: Construction "Energopol-Ukraine"
item.info: Corporate web-site with more then 5 jquery plugins. More time was spent on developing gallery and project category wich consist alot of sorted objects.

item.title: Beauty salon "Lelia"
item.info: In some metters difficult project due to not standart fonts and high requirements for compliance PSD design to markup. Optimizing web-site for very quickly pages loading

item.title: Company "Ritrama"
item.info: My first web-site based on 1C-Bitrix. Task was to copy design from official site to ukrainian branch office.

item.title: Service for legal advices
item.info: Web-site with a difficult navigation. Has been developed few custom forms. Has been done in 2 days.

item.title: Company "Web Intelligence"
item.info: Developing template for Wordpress. XMTML Markup and programming. Be me was developed front-end part of slider using nextgen gallery plugin.

item.title: Company "Vizit Service"
item.info: Markup and programming web-site from jpg design-source. Very simple web-site in 1 day with news, gallery, contact form

item.title: Agency "RTconference"
item.info: Transfer from one CMS to another. Feature requests and support.

item.title: Municipal Enterprise "KBio Himki"
item.info: Developed in one week using my own CMS DEngine Corporate. The most hard part of web-site was main page with special hover effect on the big image-map.

item.title: Shop "Aqua Breeze"
item.info: Creating internet-shop for selling pumps. Low budget allowed o create only catalog.

item.title: Company "Mucos Pharma"
item.info: Web-site for a company in which I have been working for 4 years.

item.title: Pharmaceutical company "R-Pharm"
item.info: The second web-site developed by me for Mucos Pharma. Task was to create small light-weight web-site. With no CMS.

item.title: Company "TechElectrotrade"
item.info: Due to this project was developed CMS "DEngine Shop". For a years was made more than 40 extensions.

item.title: Internet Shop "DjOne"
item.info: Due to this project was developed CMS "DEngine Shop". For a years was made more than 40 extensions.

item.title: Harry Potter fan-club in Ukraine
item.info: Fan-club of Harry Potter in Ukraine was created due to this web-site. Consist of 120 HTML pages and forum.

content.p: I prefer comfortable place ofh work and high perfomance computer technics. This is a list of my own current equipment.

equipment.item: Windows 7 / AMD Athlon II X2 3 Ghz / 4 Gb DDR3;
Linux Mint / Intel Dual Core 2.2 Ghz / GeForce 9500 GT / 2 Gb DDR2;
(situated in "Kyiv Politechnical Institute) Linux Ubuntu / Pentium IV 2,4 Ghz / 3Gb DDR;
Asus Eee PC 1215B / AMD Fusion APU E450 1.65GHz / Radeon HD 6320 / 3 Gb DDR2;

content.p: First of all I'm dad and lovely husband.
I'm front-end Developer in Svitla Systems and Inflection company. I love my job.
I very proud that took active part in development front-end architecture for a huge projects. In our project we use just modern technologies.
I like write some technical stuff in my blog, project documentation.
Free time I spend with my family. Sometimes we go to enjoy nature, sometimes stay at home and play games (favourite monopoly, playstation 3).
I love sport. I'm very skilled in tennis. I am fan of pump it up.
My favourite films is Armagedon, Star Wars. Book - Harry Potter, Lord of the Rings.
